Strict access controls

yourRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
list: Right of access: consult your personal data
Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
Right to portability: receive your data in readable format

Right to restriction: limit processing of your data
Right not to be profiled: not be subject to automated decision-making
